# .gitignore

# Virtual Environment
venv/

datasets/
data/


# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd

# Local configuration file (replace with your actual configuration file name)
.env

# IDE-specific files (VSCode, PyCharm, etc.)
.vscode/
.idea/

# Compiled Python files
*.pyc

# Compiled C extension
*.so

# Temporary files
*.swp
*.swo

# Ignore logs, databases, and other generated files
*.log
*.sqlite3
db.sqlite3
